CustomField.description: This field was created for Reporting and determines whether the Document is Needed or Optional
CustomField.formula: IF( ( (PEO_Onboarding_Checklist__r.CensusRequired__c == true && Name == 'Census')|| (PEO_Onboarding_Checklist__r.Medical_Invoice_Required__c == true && Name == 'Medical Invoice')|| (PEO_Onboarding_Checklist__r.Benefit_Summaries_Required__c == true && Name == 'Benefit Summary')|| (PEO_Onboarding_Checklist__r.Health_Insurance_Renewal_required__c == true && Name == 'Health Insurance Renewal')|| (PEO_Onboarding_Checklist__r.Claims_Report_required__c == true && Name == 'Claims Report') ), 'Needed', 'Optional')
CustomField.inlineHelpText: This field was created for Reporting and determines whether the Document is Needed or Optional
CustomField.label: PEO Document Required?
